title: I got a Leaver Buster Warning because of the game crash?
body:
I sent multiple Error reports from multiple tries to reconnect to the game. I do not understand, why there has not yet been introduced a system, that can recognize a crash and report it to the server to avoid AFK penalties

I am just so sick of it. I admire that you introduced Remake system (which my friend, that I tried to go in game with, used, after my game crashed 7 times ina  row), I understand that there is no way to recognize that the player has lost connection during the game, but when the game crashes? The CLIENT detects that itself. Why would you not implement that, and send report to the server? so I do not have to deal with bans in the future, if the code of patcher f*cks up again? 

Please.

replies.body: Update - I repaired the game, and it is still crashing. This started to happend after update 6.15

[Leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)treats all leaves equally regardless of intent, because they all cause players a negative experience.  It's important to get whatever is causing these leaves resolved and get you back in the game!

It sounds like there is a computer issue failing to properly render files and causing the game to crash.  Running a repair was a solid first step, but we may need to take a deeper look here.  Please reach out to us by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help with your specific issue.  Gather a set of logs that can automatically be obtained through the [Hextech Repair Tool,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and attach it to your ticket to give context.  We'll help get you fixed up for good!

An yeah, I know that there is a lot of discussion around leaver buster, and that it's a negative experience to other player, and everything...

But. when it's not even players fault (how could I know my game is broken? the client worked just fine!), why do we still have to receive afk penalties? I am not talking about connection loss in the middle of the game, I am talking about the specific case where I couldn't even connect because the patcher damaged my files.

Why is that not detected? Since it requires repairing or another pretty long process, it's not like I am gonna be done in 3 minutes before remake system comes in? Why is that particular situation not detected, and why players take penalties when Riot software fails to work?

Thanks for reaching out to me, but the complete re-install solved the issue. 

It took ages, but it solved the issue.

These crashes are likely due network instability.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
